NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Name: Smart Energy
NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Description: Use Smart Delay to delay your fridge from using the defrost cycle during peak energy hours.

AirFilter.Name: Air Filter Status
AirFilter.Description: Your refrigerator will let you know when it's time to order and replace the air filter.

DoorOpen.Name: Door Status
DoorOpen.Description: Your refrigerator knows if the door has been left open for more than 5 minutes. You can set your preferred alert notification in Preferences.

PowerOn.Name: Power/Wi-Fi Restored
PowerOn.Description: You will receive an alert when power or Wi-Fi to your refrigerator is restored.

PowerOutAlert.Name: Power/Wi-Fi Outage
PowerOutAlert.Description: You will receive an alert if your refrigerator loses power or connection to Wi-Fi.

WaterFilter.Name: Water Filter Status
WaterFilter.Description: Your refrigerator will let you know when it's time to order and replace the water filter.

SmartTip.Title: Tip 1
SmartTip.Content: Some fruits like avocados, bananas and peaches release ethylene gas as they ripen. Be sure to store them separately from ethylene-sensitive produce like apples, broccoli and grapes to help keep all of your produce fresher, longer.

Feature.DoorOpenAlert.Name: Door Status
Feature.DoorOpenAlert.Description: Your refrigerator knows when someone left the door open for more than 5 minutes.  You can set your preferred alert notification in Preferences.

NotificationContents.SmsText: It's just about time to replace your air filter, order now.
NotificationContents.EmailText: It's just about time to replace your air filter, order now.
NotificationContents.PushText: It's just about time to replace your air filter, order now.

NotificationContents.SmsText: You might want to check the refrigerator door - it's been open for more than 5 minutes.
NotificationContents.EmailText: You might want to check the refrigerator door - it's been open for more than 5 minutes.
NotificationContents.PushText: You might want to check the refrigerator door - it's been open for more than 5 minutes.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Your refrigerator power or Wi-Fi connection has been restored.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Your refrigerator power or Wi-Fi connection has been restored.
NotificationContents.PushText: Your refrigerator power or Wi-Fi connection has been restored.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Your refrigerator has lost connection to Wi-Fi which could be the result of a loss of power.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Your refrigerator has lost connection to Wi-Fi which could be the result of a loss of power.
NotificationContents.PushText: Your refrigerator has lost connection to Wi-Fi which could be the result of a loss of power.

NotificationContents.SmsText: It's just about time to replace your water filter, order now.
NotificationContents.EmailText: It's just about time to replace your water filter, order now.
NotificationContents.PushText: It's just about time to replace your water filter, order now.
